attributes.action: On the spot 12 points penalty for Urban Speeding (20/30/40 mph zones)
attributes.additional_details:
Urban speeding is not recognized by many motorists and motor-cyclists as being both dangerous and anti-social. This attitude can only be changed in the same way that to drink-driving was. An instant 12-points penalty will enforce the law that all other methods have singularly failed to do.
[The constant disregard of these laws by some drivers/riders is rooted in the same disrespect for all  other citizens as was the recent street rioting.]
